title: Side Effects of the Politics of Queerness (with David J. Johns)
description:
This week we are joined by National Black Justice Coalition founder David Johns who illuminates the way government unjustly intersects with queer identity.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
